metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0225 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: When processing user provided XML documents, the Spring Framework 4.0.0 to4.0.4, 3.0.0 to 3.2.8, and possibly earlier unsupported versions did notdisable by default the resolution of URI references in a DTD declaration.This enabled an XXE attack.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
